-- Contents -- Artificing and Knowledge: P.2 Research Table discovery: P.6 After-thought: Disenchanter: P.12

This table, is one of the most powerful tables in your collection. With your past knowledge of basic infusing, you are able to create powerful enchantments. Although be warned this magic does come at a price. A vast amount of EXP is used in-order to infuse a rune with an item. The more runes you intend on infusing the greater the price you will pay.

You should consider that the table doesn't have multiple uses, if you run out of symbols you can not use the table anymore. But never fear you can regain these symbols, you can use runes to regain symbols. Each level of rune gives back 3 symbols, EX:level 3 rune gives back 9 symbols.To use the runes on the table you must shift right click on the table, and you will notice that the symbols will reappear again.
